title: Intellectual Property
content: Intellectual Property In July 2018, NKU Intellectual Property Information Service Center was established and attached to Nankai University Library. The non-physical center is a part of the patent and intellectual property service management system of Nankai University. The center has one director and two deputy directors appointed by the University. Based on the Sci-tech Novelty Retrieval Workstation certified by the State Ministry of Education, the Intellectual Property Information Service Center of Nankai University has formed an excellent information service team and talent echelon. In November 2018, Nankai University joined the Alliance of University Intellectual Property Information Service. Contact us: 022-85358050 (the Jinnan Campus), 022-23509050 (the Balitai Campus) Service Provided:
